product_name: Jagwire Disc Brake Pads for Avid Brakes
long_description: These replacement disk brake pads from Jagwire are designed for use with Avid BB7 and Juicy disk brakes. HeatShield(R) technology resists heat buildup; brakes stay cool and improve control in critical situations. Special compound minimizes squeal when braking. Set of two.
short_description: These replacement disk brake pads from Jagwire are designed for use with Avid BB7 and Juicy disk brakes.
